Text: Freedom and Democracy always come with a cost. We must do everything we can to make sure that Ukraine wins this war and repels Russia.
I stand with Ukraine and we must do everything in our power to make sure that we can beat back Russia.
Vets for Buchanan. Thanks for your service and support! https://t.co/E0woSIlBiQ

Wolves, bears and women, now the Republicans want to ban abortions across the country. Does Rosendale believe that the feds should ban all abortions despite wanting to leave it to the states? I will vote to codify Roe v Wade.

I’m looking forward to this next debate at 7PM that PBS is hosting. Another opportunity to keep Rosendale accountable and get the message out that he is unfit for office. We need new leadership with a fresh perspective. Our 2 party system is not working!

Rosendale talks tough about supporting law enforcement but failed to honor the men and women who protected the Capitol and his colleagues. Shame becomes embarrassment when it comes to Rosendale’s lack of leadership!
Let’s face it, Rosendale is an embarrassment to Montana and the country. We don’t need his divisive and phony politics. We need a fresh start, I will bring Montana values to WA DC.
All of us in the race need to keep our focus on Rosendale if we want better representation here in the 2nd congressional district. We need to send Matt Back to Maryland.
I promise to hold “real public meetings” with Montanans, while my opponent said the two-party system has served the country well and voting for an Independent “is a throw away.”
Let’s be clear, I’m the only one that can beat Matt Rosendale! It was good to speak to the issues facing this state.
2 debates this week! Make sure to tune in. 2 more opportunities to hold Rosendale accountable. He has a terrible record in Congress and is a failure at representing Montana.
Why did Rosendale vote against a bipartisan commission to investigate the January 6th riot? We desperately need better representation in Montana’s 2nd congressional district!
Check out today’s IR! Great coverage of the debate and an endorsement by Veteran’s.
Rosendale often flips flops on Veteran’s issues and on his votes. Our men and women in uniform deserve better!

I decided to run when embarrassment became shame because of Rosendale’s votes against honoring the Capitol police (protecting Congress on Jan. 6); against supporting Ukraine when it was invaded by Russia; against expanding NATO when Sweden and Finland joined the defensive treaty.
Why would Rosendale not support the Capitol police that protected congress and his colleagues?
Tune in tomorrow night at 6PM for our Debate. I will be ready to hold Rosendale accountable.
Thoughts and prayers to the folks in Florida for their safety.

Another nursing home closure. This must be addressed. What is Rosendale doing to prevent more closures? Families will have to travel hundreds of miles to see loved ones.

https://t.co/MdnP7DRCqV
Erin Schermele Merchant our MC revving up the crowd with chants. Who do we want for Congress- Buchanan! Good energy at the Great Falls Rally! https://t.co/9g2ugwmDxC
Great energy in Great Falls! We can do this! https://t.co/w4cKJ3zzlN
Today is National Public Lands Day-I will always support access to public lands and I will oppose any effort to privatize them. Keep public lands in public hands!

Both parties have failed us. They play games and resort to cheap gimmicks and outright lies. We deserve better and must demand more out of our elected officials. I won’t play games, I will always be straight up and tell you the truth.
I’m the only person that can win this race in Montana’s second congressional district. I am the only one that can defeat Rosendale! #Readytoleadondayone

Does Matt Rosendale support Trump’s notion that he can declassify top secret documents by just thinking he did it? Really? Do you believe this Matt? This is Trumps biggest supporter in Montana. #We must do better!
We must strengthen our democracy and stand up to extremists! Our democratic republic is at risk. We cannot allow divisive politicians to create dysfunction and chaos in our country. This must stop!
I look forward to holding Rosendale accountable at Montana’s 2nd Congressional District U.S. House debate on October 1st at 6 PM in Great Falls and will be televised by MTN News.
Rosendale finally relented and will participate in a debate on October 1st. People in Montana’s 2nd congressional district need to hear from all of the candidates! Stay tuned for more details.
12 nursing homes have shut down this year. Montana’s long term care is in crisis. Our senior citizens deserve better representation!
What is Rosendale doing about increasing Medicaid rates? Skilled Nursing Homes are closing and families are being separated. Our elderly citizens deserve better!
https://t.co/COd1GkMTvf
Montana’s nursing homes are in crisis. Families are being separated and care is diminishing. What is Rosendale doing to fix this crisis?
Buchanan Country! That’s Don Harriet on the ladder! Our volunteers are awesome! https://t.co/AYlC70Afie

Definitely a good sign that beef prices are peaking, but we still have a long way to go before inflation is truly under control.

#inflation

We have to stand with Montana farmers against huge corporations.

Although there are some parts of the Manchin-Schumer compromise I like, I think it’s misnamed. I’m skeptical that the “Inflation Reduction Act” will have an effect on inflation.

Manchin deserves a lot of credit for making this bill more fiscally responsible. #inflation #manchin

Hogan might be reading the cards... wouldn't be surprised to see many independents running in 2024!

https://t.co/0wyiBB7fnU
Thanks to the Laurel Rotary Club for inviting me yesterday to speak at their weekly meeting and meet their members! https://t.co/hh2bk1zbRT

The Montana Supreme Court made the right choice yesterday when it blocked new, restrictive abortion laws from taking effect. 

The state legislature shouldn't be able to get around legal precedent. Our constitution's right to privacy should prevail.

Before insurance, my granddaughter would be paying $175 per vial for her Type 1 diabetes in Montana. Across the border in Canada, she would only need to pay $35.

Congress needs to act on the outrageous cost of life-saving drugs in this country.

#Insulin

I've always said the IRS needs more funding. It's in the best interest of everyone to have competent agents and an efficient audit structure. Even conservative accountants agree!

https://t.co/ob34GrdOmf

Stronger US manufacturing and less dependence on global supply chains help rural Montanans. We can't let politicians in Washington forget about rural communities.

https://t.co/jkxh0XRuhF

I don’t think politicians should be involved in difficult medical decisions.

#WomensRights #KansasVoteNo

Clear heads prevailed and the PACT Act passed. Thank you to all the veterans who protested and refused to let political meddling come before healthcare.

Matt Rosendale voted against all of this.

Good to see that the Senate is taking steps to strengthen American manufacturing.

Last week I heard from a grandfather who said that whenever he drops his grandkids off for school, he memorizes what they’re wearing in case he has to identify them later. Matt Rosendale once again said “No” to a bipartisan effort to do something for the safety of our children.

I'm pro-privacy because a woman's decision is no one's business but her own.

Unbelievable devastation. We are with all those affected, from Gardiner to Red Lodge and elsewhere! https://t.co/1OuKdYDWoM

My prayers are with the good people of Carbon and Stillwater Counties and the first responders working tirelessly to mitigate the severe flooding that has ravaged their communities. Stay safe, everyone!

Give me a break...my family has been supporters of Zoo Montana for decades. They've welcomed events of all persuasions, including for Evangelical Christians and other religious groups. Rosendale’s statement that ZooMontana decided to “promote child abuse" is a discriminatory lie.

“Marc and I have both given a lot of our lives to Montana and politics. So we talked. And we agreed – if we want better, let it start with us.” 

- State Senator Dorothy Bradley
